lead_paragraph: The Sky team of the two-time defending champion Chris Froome began the six-day Tour of Romandie by winning a team time trial.

headline.print_headline: Froome’s Sky Team Wins Time Trial
headline.main: Froome’s Sky Team Wins Time Trial

snippet: The Sky team of the two-time defending champion Chris Froome began the six-day Tour of Romandie by winning a team time trial.
abstract: Sky cycling team, led by defending champion Chris Froome, wins team time trial at six-day Tour of Romandie.
